metadata.name: Energy Within
metadata.description:
This artwork represents the energy that flows through each of us. The waves and currents in our bodies, that fuel us to create, to live and express our true selves.

I live with Mitochondrial disease , an energy disease. My energy is an extremely precious resource, so I must be careful when choosing how to expend it. Creating art through my photography, has always been a worthy practice in which to use my body's resources. In turn it is my therapy, and a large part of how I get through each day.

Through compositing my light painting photographs (a series of long exposure photographs combined with the manipulation of light painting tools), and a layer of Rik Oostenbroek's 'Self' artwork, I've portrayed this ebb and flow of energy.
